input.name: __VIEWSTATE

p.span: The well-being of our students and staff is the highest priority for our schools.
With the recently elevated concern regarding the Coronavirus (COVID-19), we have created this section of the website as a resource to families, and to share hour-by-hour updates as necessary.

li.a: CHS UPDATE | April 21, 2020 | REMOTE LEARNING EXTENDED
CHS UPDATE | April 17, 2020 | NO WORD ON REOPENING SCHOOLS
CHS UPDATE | April 9, 2020 | BEST COMMUNITY FOR MUSIC EDUCATION
CHS UPDATE | April 6, 2020 | CONTINUING THE EXCELLENCE
CHS UPDATE | April 1, 2020 | INFO FOR SENIORS
CHS UPDATE | March 19, 2020 | ANSWERS TO YOUR QUESTIONS
CHS UPDATE | March 17, 2020 | HOME LEARNING PLAN
CHS UPDATE | March 16, 2020 | HOME LEARNING & MEALS
CHS UPDATE | March 15, 2020 | NO SCHOOL MONDAY

a.text-node: | WHAT TO EXPECT NEXT THREE WEEKS
